page.title: 08DALGETY SPILLERS
page.content: Last week, 15th of May,we went to Dalgety Spillers alias the new mill.Unfortunately they were very busy so we could only get a little information. The mill was built fifty-five years ago in 1930. Their main produce is grain,fertlizer and chemicals which they sell to different firms.In the past fifty-five years the mill has been changed quite frequently, it also has a lot more ladies working here than it used to have years ago.The owner of the mill is now Mr Clenaham,but he has not owned the mill since it was built. The mill is situated on Station Road and is in production six days of the week.
